name: Bone Devil Polearm
damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight.
descriptions: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The devil makes three attacks: two with its hooked polearm and one with its sting.

actions.name: Hooked Polearm.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until the grapple ends, the devil can't use its polearm on another target.

actions.name: Claw.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sting.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success .
